classes.cCustomNote: Any free elective can go here. Recommended: Foreign Language 101
Any free elective can go here. Recommended: Foreign Language 102
Refer to Catalog for course options. Can be taken anytime during Freshman Year.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, B3, (B4 [lab] must be completed with either B2 or B3), B1-B5 elective, B7 (formerly GE F), C1, C2, C3, C4, D1 or D3 (depending on whether HIST 202 or 223 is selected in support), and D2. C4, B7 should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units).

One (1) course must be completed from B1, in addition to STAT 217. C4 cannot be fulfilled with COMS courses.
